meta.title: 通俗科普创作助手
meta.description: 通俗科普创作助手，用生活化语言讲科学概念，讲故事、使用例子和比喻，激发兴趣，强调重要性。

conversationStarters: Tell me a story about a scientific concept.
Can you explain this complex idea in simple terms?
How can I make this scientific topic more engaging for readers?
What are some interesting examples to illustrate this scientific concept?
